    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ángulos en polígonos regulares</string>
            <string language="en">Angles in regular polygons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel in den regelmäßigen Polygonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angles dans les polygones réguliers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos em polygons regulares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angoli nei poligoni normali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνίες στα κανονικά πολύγωνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">"unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los ángulos de polígonos regulares. Se estudian los ángulos centrales, interiores y exteriores; y sus relaciones. "</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to calculate the angles in regular polygons. It studies central, inscribed and exterior angles and the relations among them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exterior</string>
            <string language="en">exterior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">central</string>
            <string language="en">central</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo</string>
            <string language="en">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">interior</string>
            <string language="en">inscribed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polígonos regulares</string>
            <string language="en">regular polygons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Winkel in den regelmäßigen Polygonen zu errechnen.
Sie studiert die zentralen, inscribed und Außenwinkel und die 
Relationen unter ihnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de calculer les angles dans les polygones réguliers. 
Elle étudie des angles centraux, inscrits et 
extérieurs et les relations parmi eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações calcular 
os ângulos em polygons regulares. Estuda ângulos centrais, 
inscritos e exteriores e as relações entre eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
calcolare gli angoli nei poligoni normali. Studia loro gli 
angoli centrali, inscribed ed esterni ed i rapporti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να υπολογίσει τις γωνίες στα κανονικά πολύγωνα. Μελετά 
τις κεντρικές, εγγραμμένες και εξωτερικές γωνίες και τις σχέσεις 
μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
